thread.title: Daily People & Society News

title: Daily People & Society News
text: Kerala will set up 10,000 new yoga clubs: Health Minister Veena George Madhya Pradesh Police arrest over 1K involved in cattle smuggling in 6 months Adopt scientific approach to fixing MSP for all crops: Sukhbir Badal Delhi's Nigambodh Ghat sees sudden spike in bodies being brought for cremation Yoga helped actress Apoorva Arora relieve PCOD symptoms Egyptian consular teams search for missing Haj pilgrims in Saudi hospitals IYD celebrations: Sopore student thrilled over doing Yoga with PM Modi in Srinagar Books as makeshift blocks, chairs for seated postures - Geetanjali Mishra on her yoga props PM Modi arrives in Srinagar on 2-day visit All people living in K'taka should learn Kannada: CM Siddaramaiah Surya Namaskar serves as coping mechanism for Shambhavi Singh, helps her 'stay energised' 'Ishq Jabariya' actress Siddhi Sharma's favourite Yoga pose is 'Trikonasana'; it makes her flexible Rajeev Khandelwal says Yoga is real workout, enhances potential of other workouts Alia Bhatt wakes up celeb fitness trainer Yasmin Karachiwala 'early in the morning' Balasore clash: Curfew relaxed by four hours on Thursday Ratna Bhandar of Jagannath Temple not to open on July 8: Odisha Minister clarifies (Ld) Caste consciousness is on the rise among educated people: K'taka CM Western Railway official completes South Africa's grueling Comrades Marathon-2024 Yoga Day: How 'Chintan Shibir' conceptualised in 2003 became hallmark of Modi governance Dozens die in extreme Haj heat, toll feared to be in hundreds PM Modi to lead Yoga Day celebrations in Srinagar on Friday; launch projects worth crores Ahead of International Yoga Day, Vidisha Srivastava shares her homemade yoga props Ancient India wasn't just economic, cultural leader in world but also of science, tech: Ola founder Sana Makbul's favourite yoga poses: Bhujangasana and Dhanurasana PM Modi inaugurates new campus of Nalanda University, terms it 'symbol of India's academic heritage' Kharge writes to Lok Sabha Speaker, RS Chairman over relocation of statues in Parliament Anne Hathaway shares DIY beauty hack for plumper lips
